apiLoginRefreshSecs.title: API Refresh
apiLoginRefreshSecs.description: How often should Vivint Homebridge renew the session token.

ignoreDeviceTypes.title: Ignored Device Types
ignoreDeviceTypes.description: Selected device types would be ignored on startup. Useful in case of external integrations like Nest or MyQ that may be managed directly by another Homebridge plugin.

disableCameras.title: Disable cameras
disableCameras.description: If checked, camera video feeds would not appear in Homebridge.
